title: Microphone.Block.Paid.Apk
description:
On an average Android phonethere are about 14 Apps that have record audio (microphone) permission and can be eavesdropping or misused to record you or your calls at anytime. Each of these Apps can record your voice, speech and call anytime they want. Most of the Apps have internet access permission and can transfer your recordings to anywhere in the world.
This App will protect your phone from spying on you or recording your voice or calls 
by : virus, spyware, malware, backdoor or surveillance applications.
Features : Block and disable your microphone with one single click.
Protect your audio privacy. Use the home screen widget for quick access.
Use the "spy catcher" analyzer to see if you haven't already been spied on or recorded. Blocking of all call, audio, voice recorder type of applications. If you want to temporarily unblock select the range from 5 mins to 20 mins. 
Enjoy and re-seed please!!!
